author: Reuters Editorial
title: IP Group Says FY Profit Of 53.4 Mln Pounds
text:
March 29 (Reuters) - IP Group Plc:
* ‍FY NET PORTFOLIO GAINS OF £94.2M (2016: £6.5M)​ * FY ‍TOTAL FUNDS RAISED BY PORTFOLIO COMPANIES OF £315M (2016: £230M)​
* ‍FY PROFIT £53.4M (2016: LOSS £14.8M)​ * ‍WE LOOK TO REST OF YEAR WITH CONTINUED CONFIDENCE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
